name: 2310 seconds in HELL
description:
Gameplay



Fighting demons and parkour await you. The game is short, so it is assumed that you will complete it in one day. It will be very cool if you complete it in less than 2310 seconds.

Scene



The location of the action takes place in hell, as you might have guessed from the title.

Additionally



The game has two endings

In the game you can walk, jump, hit, shoot, kill enemies, kill yourself. Adventures in hell await you. You will go to jail. You will fight demons. At the end of this short game, a boss awaits you.

The game has funny white balls that you can kick. These are just ordinary balls, they don't do anything, but they are funny.

You control a man who has gone to hell in a strange way. Why? The game does not answer this question, but your imagination can answer it.

Who is your main enemy? Your main enemy is a big demon who is always trying to kill you. At the end of the game, this will be your boss. There will be a very cool battle.
